Is there any way that we can speed up the process?  I have been googling for hours and everything just tells me to use structure blocks, but those don't work on bedrock edition so they're not an option.

His realm shows up when I click "join realm", but after that nothing happens. It loads the loading screen for like 1 second then kicks me back to the menu. He also told me he had no issues with anyone else joining so its obviously an issue on my end. We have tried restarting our devices, resetting internet connections and even reinstalling minecraft. Nothing works! Please help us fix this before we go insane.

I am now trying to play with my little brother on switch but every time I log in he's beating me at everything we do. Is there any reason why someone who has played so much Java edition would struggle against an elementary schooler on switch? It just doesn't make sense!

Has anyone else experienced this before? Any ideas what could be causing this and how to fix it?  I can provide more details about the error messages if needed. Thanks in advance for your help!

title: Is there a mod that adds new villagers?

title: My world has become unplayable...
self_text: So I have a friend who decided to make an entire map of the UK in minecraft, he uploaded it and i downloaded it. He was messing with commands on his side before uploading so some areas are just really weird and buggy, but that's not my main problem. There are random holes everywhere, like big empty caves going down thousands of blocks, there is no bedrock anywhere which means you can fall out of the world, and when I try to build or mine anything in these areas the game freezes for around 5-10 seconds at a time. Its making it impossible to play as every area of the map is affected.  Is there any way to fix this? Or am I forced to start a new world?

title: Can’t play on my Minecraft account on mobile, how do I fix?
self_text: So for the past few days now I haven't been able to get into my Minecraft account on mobile. Whenever it tries to log in it gives me a message saying "Authentication Failed - Incorrect Username or Password" but I know that isn't the case as I can still sign into Minecraft on PC with no issue. Please help, I have no idea what's happening and need to be able to play Minecraft again soon.
